content: So, I should add my list of prs somewhere, talking about this rustc-dev-guide#619
I'd like to hear ideas on how to integrate that into rustc-dev-guide
we want to make an appendix to start with or how would we add this
I think an Appendix or something like that may be good but at some point it could be better integrated into the chapters (unsure)
In particular, I have a vision where each chapter starts with (1) a recap of what has happened so far in the compilation process and (2) an example PR or some other useful example
@Santiago Pastorino Perhaps could you open a PR for an appendix? Maybe integration into the chapters could be a good thing to add for the organization of the guide?
